track.name: Algorithms
track.descriptions: The true test of problem solving: when one realizes that time and memory aren't infinite.

primary_contest.description:
101 Hack July is here! It's all about speed, accuracy and efficiency. Inside the contest are 3 challenges. You have exactly 180 minutes to solve them. Every second counts.

HackerRank invites you to join the contest to compete against hackers from across the globe.

Next up is 20/20 Hack on Aug 2nd


Sign up at www.hackerrank.com/2020hack
primary_contest.name: 101 Hack July

model.preview: Find the sum of the number of connected component(S) in every graph.
model.name: Subset Component
